title: Rebuild Noventra.Ai landing page generator as a fresh project

requirements.text: Rebuild the complete Noventra.Ai landing page generator application from scratch as a fresh project, preserving all existing functionality: session management (create, list, delete sessions), chat interface with AI assistant, landing page HTML/CSS scaffold generation, and live preview of generated landing pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new sessions with a project name and project type selection
Users can view a list of past sessions with project type icons and timestamps
Chat interface displays messages with code block rendering
AI assistant generates landing page HTML/CSS scaffolds for the 'Landing Page' project type
Generated landing pages are rendered as a live visual preview within the chat or session view
Sessions and messages are persisted in the backend
Backend uses owner-based access control so users only see their own sessions

requirements.text: Preserve the existing dark theme design system: Space Grotesk / Inter / JetBrains Mono typography, OKLCH color tokens, glassmorphism card styles, glow effects, and the overall Noventra.Ai visual identity across all pages (Home, Sessions, New Session, Chat).
acceptanceCriteria: Dark theme with OKLCH color tokens is applied globally
Glassmorphism card styles and glow effects are present on interactive elements
Space Grotesk, Inter, and JetBrains Mono fonts are loaded and used appropriately
All pages (Home, Sessions, New Session, Chat) are visually consistent with the Noventra.Ai brand

constraints: All Motoko logic must remain in a single main actor (backend/main.mo)
